footer_navigation.title: Dogeverse
footer_navigation.disclaimer: Disclaimer: Dogeverse is a meme coin with speculative value derived only from the universal cultural capital of the Doge Meme. Crypto prices fluctuate wildly. Ape responsibly.

wert.title: Wert Widget
wert.desc: Please wait while we are initializing the Wert widget.
wert.disclaimer: By continuing, you're purchasing {{token}} tokens. Your tokens won't be immediately deposited to your wallet. You'll be able to claim them on the claim date that will be announced at a later date. After you claim them, they will be deposited to your wallet.
wert.meme_token: Dogeverse is a meme token and is not an ETF in any way, shape or form.

popup.exploring_des: Your wallet is the gateway to all things Ethereum, the magical technology that makes it possible to explore Web3.
popup.ref_text: Copy your referral link below and send it to your friends. For every purchase made using this link, you’ll receive 5% of the purchase amount.
popup.change_chain_info: Are you sure you want to change?
popup.change_swap_text: If you purchase on {{mode}} during the presale, you won't be eligible for the {{apy}}% annual returns from staking. We recommend buying on Ethereum if you want to stake.

popup.hit_btn_connect: Hit the button below and use the QR code scanner in the Best Wallet app in order to connect.
popup.mobile_wallet_desc: If you're on mobile, please open this inside your wallet's built-in browser.

faq.faq_cont_1: Dogeverse is the first truly multichain meme coin, with Cosmo the Doge bringing $DOGEVERSE to all the biggest blockchains.
faq.faq_head_2: How do I participate in the presale?
faq.faq_cont_2: You can take part in the presale on Ethereum, Polygon, or BNB Chain. All you need to do is connect your wallet to the presale widget above and send ETH, BNB, MATIC, or USDT to reserve $DOGEVERSE tokens.
faq.faq_head_3: When do I receive my presale tokens?
faq.faq_cont_3: Once you’ve completed your presale purchase, you’ll be able to use the same wallet to claim your tokens before the first DEX listing. Claim and listing dates will be announced on our social media accounts.
faq.faq_cont_4: Staking is the action of sending your tokens to a smart contract and locking them for a defined period of time. This will earn you more $DOGEVERSE tokens over time at a dynamic rate. Dogeverse staking is only available on the Ethereum network for now. For more information, click on 'Staking' in the navigation bar.
faq.faq_head_5: Is there a way to contact support?
faq.faq_cont_5: We’re here to help! Kindly join our Telegram channel to find prompt support from a Dogeverse moderator. You could also email contact@dogeverse.io and await a response.

banner.title: DOGEVERSE
banner.desc: The World’s First Chain Traveling Doge

about.title: Buy and claim
about.list1: Spawned by a collapsing supernova, Cosmo the Doge was born with the unique ability to hyperjump between the stars of the crypto universe. His time-tested voyages across Ethereum and Solana transformed the Doge Meme into a symbol of unity and creativity, giving rise to the Dogeverse. Now, Cosmo has discovered a way to share his chain-traveling ability so that $DOGEVERSE holders can freely traverse the best crypto chains. What a good boy.
about.list2: Dogeverse is the first Doge Meme token built on a multichain network spanning Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Solana, Avalanche and Base. Welcome to an interconnected universe of doge lovers where community, rewards, and creative fun converge. Stake your $DOGEVERSE tokens on Ethereum to earn passive rewards and increase your bags throughout meme season.
about.list3: Cosmo endeavours to unite the crypto meme community and stand as the vanguard of multichain utility. As the first Doge Meme to be launched on six different blockchains, Cosmo’s only wish is to see his name up in lights on every DEX, every CEX, and every place where meme degens congregate. With a nose for interstellar convergence, Cosmo brings a multichain dimension to the meaning of trending on DEXTools.
about.subtitle: DOGE GOES MULTICHAIN

multi_bridge.title: Multi
multi_bridge.desc1: Cosmo is the adorable little face of the first meme coin to grace the six most active blockchains outside of Bitcoin.
multi_bridge.desc2: The $DOGEVERSE token will be launched on Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Solana, Avalanche and Base.
multi_bridge.desc3: Utilizing superior bridging technology, $DOGEVERSE will be seamlessly multichain in just a few clicks, with miniscule gas fees to worry about. Cosmo is making Doge culture multichain!

staking.title: Welcome to Dogeverse Staking
staking.desc: The distribution of Dogeverse token rewards will occur at a rate of 6088 $DOGEVERSE per Ethereum (ETH) block and will be disbursed over 2 years.
staking.withdraw_text: All staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
staking.pool_share: Dogeverse staking rewards are distributed at a rate of 6088 $DOGEVERSE per ETH block. Your percentage of the pool will determine what percentage of the 6088 $DOGEVERSE tokens you receive.
staking.whitelist_now: The current presale round is open to whitelisted wallets only
staking.sold_out_desc: Due to unprecedented demand, Phase 1 is now over! Phase 2 is coming soon, so keep your eyes on the countdown and ready your wallets to pickup Dogeverse ahead of the Dogeverse launch.
staking.stake_claim_success: All staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
staking.stake_transction_info: {{stakeAmount}} Dogeverse tokens will be staked once the transaction completes
staking.stake_view_transaction_info: Please click on the View Transaction button for more details.
staking.stake_waiting_approve: In order to stake Dogeverse, you first need to authorize us to access the Dogeverse in your wallet
staking.waiting_confirm_stake: In order to buy and stake your Dogeverse tokens, please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
staking.waiting_confirm_stake_2: All staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
staking.stake_waiting_confirm: In order to stake Dogeverse, please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
staking.stake_popup_info: Unclaimed $DOGEVERSE that was bought using ETH or ERC-20 USDT can be staked now. Please note that all early staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
staking.transction_info_stake: {{baseToken}} tokens will be purchased and staked once the transaction is confirmed.
staking.transction_info_stake_success: {{baseToken}} tokens have now been staked! Check the dashboard for details.
staking.claim_stale_help: Confirm the transaction in your wallet to stake your Dogeverse now. This will automatically stake all of your Dogeverse tokens. Tokens will be locked for 7 days after the claiming process goes live.
staking.claim_success: Your tokens have been claimed successfully.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.title_1: Dogeverse has a total supply of 200,000,000,000 tokens
tokenomics.desc: The $DOGEVERSE token is minted on Ethereum and is unique in that it can also be claimed, stored and traded on Solana, BNB Chain, Base, Polygon, or Avalanche using Wormhole and Portal Bridge tech.

how_to.heading: How To Buy?
how_to.subtitle: Step 1
how_to.title: Connect Wallet
how_to.desc: Find the presale widget at the top of this web page and connect your preferred wallet. There are various options to choose from.
how_to.desc1: Once connected, you can choose to participate in the Dogeverse presale on Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon, Avalanche or Base. Solana is also coming soon!
how_to.desc2: Enter the amount of ETH, BNB, MATIC, AVAX, USDT or USDC you wish to swap for $DOGEVERSE and confirm the transaction in your wallet.
how_to.desc3: Once the presale concludes, you will be able to claim your $DOGEVERSE tokens using the same wallet and chain you used to buy.
how_to.desc4: $DOGEVERSE will be tradable on all major chains and DEXs. Simply use the Dogeverse Bridge to easily switch tokens between chains.
